welcomesurvey-save-confirmation-text: {{GENDER:|Izimpendulo zakho}} zizosisiza ukuthi sikunikeze izindlela eziwusizo zokuqalisa ku-Wikipedia.
welcomesurvey-subtitle: Sisize sithuthukise ukuzizwisa kwakho kwe-{{GENDER:|}} kwe-Wikipedia ngokuphendula imibuzo embalwa ongakhetha kukho.
welcomesurvey-privacy-policy-link-text: Funda kabanzi mayelana nedatha yabahleli abasha
welcomesurvey-sidebar-editing-text: Cishe wonke amakhasi angahlelwa yinoma ubani, futhi amakhulu ezinguquko enziwa njalo ngehora ukuze kwengezwe okuqukethwe, kulungiswe amaphutha, futhi kuthuthukiswe ukufundeka. Amakhasi alandelayo angasiza uma {{GENDER:$1| unentshisekelo}} ekunikeleni.
welcomesurvey-question-reason-label: Kungani u-{{GENDER:|you}} udale i-akhawunti yakho namuhla?
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-edi: Ukulungisa iphutha noma iphutha esihlokweni se-Wikipedia
Ukwengeza noma ukushintsha ulwazi esihlokweni se-Wikipedia
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-add: Ukwengeza isithombe noma isithombe esihlokweni se-Wikipedia
welcomesurvey-question-reason-option-pro: Ngibamba iqhaza kuhlelo, ikilasi, noma umcimbi
welcomesurvey-question-edited-option-no-: Cha, bengingazi ukuthi ngingakwazi ukuhlela iWikipedia
welcomesurvey-question-mailinglist-label: Ngifuna ukuthola amathiphu nge-imeyili okuthi ungaqala kanjani ukuhlela.
welcomesurvey-question-mailinglist-help: Sicela uqaphele ukuthi lolu hlu lwamakheli luxhaswe yi-MailChimp, okusho ukuthi ukusebenzisa kwe-MailChimp ulwazi lwe-{{GENDER:|yakho}} kulawulwa [https://www.intuit.com/privacy/statement/ Privacy Policy] kanye [https://mailchimp.com/legal/terms/ Imigomo Yesevisi].
welcomesurvey-question-email-help: Siqaphele ukuthi u-{{GENDER:|you}} awuzange ufake i-imeyili ngenkathi udala le akhawunti. Kunconywa kakhulu , njengoba i-imeyili iyadingeka ukuze i-akhawunti itholwe uma kwenzeka ulahlekelwa iphasiwedi yakho. QAPHELA: Ikheli lakho le-imeyili alivezwa lapho abanye abasebenzisi bexhumana nawe.
welcomesurvey-question-languages-label: I-{{SITENAME}} itholakala cishe ngezilimi ezingu-300. Ingabe zikhona ezinye izilimi {{GENDER:|you}} ozifunda futhi ubhale ngazo?
welcomesurvey-question-languages-placeho: Engeza kufika ku {{PLURAL:$1| ulimi olulodwa| $1 izilimi}}...
